organizationId.description: Organization ID, used together with pluginId and version to create a combined-plugin-id. Should not include spaces of dots (.)

pluginId.description: Plugin ID, used together with organizationId and version to create a combined-plugin-id. Should not include spaces of dots (.)

pluginVersion.description: Plugin version. Dot separated 3 or 4 parts.

maVersion.description: MA3 version. Used in the plugin XML

maPluginName.description: Plugin Display Name. Used in the plugin XML, and will be displayed to the user.

pluginFolderName.description: Plugin foder name. Used together with organizationId, to create the maPluginFolder which is used in the plugin XML
